article.title: Lockheed Martin Awarded Machinery Control System Modernization Contract for Navy Destroyers
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Lockheed Martin has been awarded a $15 million firm-fixed-price contract as part of the U.S. Navy's Modernization Program for the DDG 51 Arleigh Burke-class destroyers. The contract includes options and engineering services that if exercised would bring the cumulative value to $51.5 million.
